references: Related: Ord 36852, Ord 38065, Ord 38469, Ordinance No. 40804
summary: An ordinance relating to and authorizing the sale to R. C. Storrie & Co. of $625,000 Seattle Municipal Light and Power Plant and System Bonds, 1918, authorized by Ordinance No. No. 36852, as amended by Ordinance No. 38065, as amended by Ordinance No. No. 38469, as amended by Ordinance No. 40804, fixing the rate of interest thereon, the maturities, denominations, date and installment designations thereof, and repealing all ordinances and parts of ordinances inconsistent herewith.
